__e: The unsub tells the victim that he promised, which implies some sort of commitment to someone.
He'd already promised the job to me.
On the other hand, Adele... the woman I'm suppose to be married to... she is the absolute right woman for me.
Like I'm still waiting for something I felt was promised to me that day, something that never came, and I'm angry about it.
If I hadn't promised your mom before she died, I'd -
He's married and always promised to respect my space to never bring that wife of his here.
Hey. So, you remember how we promised that you would have a driver every week so you could visit your aunt.
Unless you promised him he could keep it anyway.
Promise or no promise to your mother,
"I shouldn't have promised you the print of a movie I can't get?"
If my mom wouldn't have been ill, I would have smashed your face already.
